violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: ECONFIG - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST validate transport configuration. Common issues: missing host/port, invalid auth structure, unsupported options. Use environment variables for credentials, never hardcode. Call verify() after createTransport() to test configuration.

lines.content: // ❌ EDGE CASE 1: Missing await in serverless (MOST COMMON BUG - 30-40% of issues)

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: ECONNECTION, ETIMEDOUT, EDNS, ESOCKET - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch connection errors. ECONNECTION: TCP connection failed or closed unexpectedly. ETIMEDOUT: Connection/greeting/socket timeout (defaults: 2min/30s/10min). EDNS: Hostname DNS resolution failed. ESOCKET: Low-level socket error from net/tls modules. These errors are TRANSIENT and RETRIABLE with exponential backoff.

lines.content: // ❌ Missing await - function exits before email sends!

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: EAUTH, ENOAUTH, EOAUTH2 - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch authentication errors. EAUTH: Invalid username/password, account locked, unsupported auth method. ENOAUTH: Authentication required but not configured. EOAUTH2: OAuth2 token refresh failed or invalid credentials. DO NOT RETRY - indicates configuration issue. Check SMTP credentials and account status.

lines.content: // ❌ Missing await - function exits before email sends!

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: ETLS, EREQUIRETLS - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch TLS errors. ETLS: Certificate validation failed, hostname mismatch, STARTTLS failed. EREQUIRETLS: RFC 8689 REQUIRETLS extension unsupported by server. DO NOT RETRY - indicates certificate or TLS configuration issue. Verify SSL certificate validity and STARTTLS support.

lines.content: // ❌ Missing await - function exits before email sends!

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: EENVELOPE - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST validate email addresses before sending. EENVELOPE: Invalid recipient format, missing from/to address, SMTP rejected. Validate against RFC 5321/5322 before calling sendMail(). Check info.rejected array for partial failures. SECURITY: Sanitize addresses to prevent CVE-2021-23400 (header injection).

lines.content: // ❌ Missing await - function exits before email sends!

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: EMESSAGE, EFILEACCESS, EURLACCESS, EFETCH, ESTREAM - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST validate message content and attachments. EMESSAGE: Invalid message structure, encoding issues. EFILEACCESS: Attachment file not found or unreadable. EURLACCESS: Cannot fetch URL attachment. EFETCH: HTTP error fetching remote content. ESTREAM: Attachment stream failed. Verify attachment paths exist and are readable before sending.

violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST handle protocol errors. EPROTOCOL: SMTP protocol error from server. ECONFIG: Invalid transport configuration. EMAXLIMIT: Message size exceeds server limit. Check SMTP server logs and message size limits.

violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST validate transport configuration. Common issues: missing host/port, invalid auth structure, unsupported options. Use environment variables for credentials, never hardcode. Call verify() after createTransport() to test configuration.

lines.content: // ❌ EDGE CASE 4: Not checking info.rejected (SILENT FAILURES)

lines.content: // ❌ WRONG: Reusable transporter but no error handling

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: ECONNECTION, ETIMEDOUT, EDNS, ESOCKET - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch connection errors. ECONNECTION: TCP connection failed or closed unexpectedly. ETIMEDOUT: Connection/greeting/socket timeout (defaults: 2min/30s/10min). EDNS: Hostname DNS resolution failed. ESOCKET: Low-level socket error from net/tls modules. These errors are TRANSIENT and RETRIABLE with exponential backoff.

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: EAUTH, ENOAUTH, EOAUTH2 - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch authentication errors. EAUTH: Invalid username/password, account locked, unsupported auth method. ENOAUTH: Authentication required but not configured. EOAUTH2: OAuth2 token refresh failed or invalid credentials. DO NOT RETRY - indicates configuration issue. Check SMTP credentials and account status.

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: ETLS, EREQUIRETLS - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch TLS errors. ETLS: Certificate validation failed, hostname mismatch, STARTTLS failed. EREQUIRETLS: RFC 8689 REQUIRETLS extension unsupported by server. DO NOT RETRY - indicates certificate or TLS configuration issue. Verify SSL certificate validity and STARTTLS support.

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: EENVELOPE - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST validate email addresses before sending. EENVELOPE: Invalid recipient format, missing from/to address, SMTP rejected. Validate against RFC 5321/5322 before calling sendMail(). Check info.rejected array for partial failures. SECURITY: Sanitize addresses to prevent CVE-2021-23400 (header injection).

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: EMESSAGE, EFILEACCESS, EURLACCESS, EFETCH, ESTREAM - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST validate message content and attachments. EMESSAGE: Invalid message structure, encoding issues. EFILEACCESS: Attachment file not found or unreadable. EURLACCESS: Cannot fetch URL attachment. EFETCH: HTTP error fetching remote content. ESTREAM: Attachment stream failed. Verify attachment paths exist and are readable before sending.

violations.description: No try-catch block found. Error with code: EPROTOCOL, ECONFIG, EMAXLIMIT - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST handle protocol errors. EPROTOCOL: SMTP protocol error from server. ECONFIG: Invalid transport configuration. EMAXLIMIT: Message size exceeds server limit. Check SMTP server logs and message size limits.

violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST validate transport configuration. Common issues: missing host/port, invalid auth structure, unsupported options. Use environment variables for credentials, never hardcode. Call verify() after createTransport() to test configuration.
